name: Normal Vision
description: Standard human visual sense. Already Accurate and Acute by default.

name: Normal Hearing
description: Standard human auditory sense. Already Acute by default.

name: Normal Smell/Taste
description: Standard human olfactory and gustatory senses.

name: Normal Touch
description: Standard human tactile sense. Already Accurate by default.

name: Normal Mental Sense
description: Baseline mental awareness, if applicable to the character concept (often a descriptor for other senses).

name: Accurate
parameter_prompt: Specify one non-visual/tactile sense to make Accurate (e.g., Hearing, Smell)
description: An accurate sense can pinpoint exact location. Visual & Tactile are normally accurate. Cost 2 PP for one specific non-standard sense. For an entire sense type (e.g. all Auditory), cost is 4 PP (take this twice for the same sense type or GM discretion).

name: Acute
parameter_prompt: Specify one non-visual/auditory sense to make Acute (e.g., Olfactory, Taste)
description: Sense fine details, distinguish & identify subjects. Visual & Auditory are normally acute. Cost 1 PP for one specific non-standard sense. For an entire sense type (e.g. all Olfactory), cost is 2 PP (take this twice or GM discretion).

name: Analytical
parameter_prompt: Specify one Acute sense to make Analytical
description: Perceive specific details like chemical composition, exact dimensions. Applied to an Acute sense. Cost 1 PP for one sense. For an entire Acute sense type, cost is 2 PP (take this twice or GM discretion).

name: Awareness (Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: Specify descriptor for Awareness and sense type used (e.g., 'Magic via Mental Sense', 'Psionics via Visual Aura Reading')
description: Sense use of effects with a particular descriptor (Perception DC 10). Choose sense type (often mental or a special visual/auditory perception). Cost 1 PP.

name: Communication Link
parameter_prompt: Individual linked with & sense medium (e.g., 'Telepathic with Professor X', 'Radio Link with Teammate Alpha')
description: Mental or other communication link with a specific individual (who must also have this sense or compatible Communication power). Cost 1 PP per link.

name: Counters Concealment (One Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type and the specific Concealment it counters (e.g., 'Vision counters Invisibility to Normal Sight', 'Hearing counters Silence effects')
description: A chosen sense type ignores one specific Concealment effect or descriptor. Cost 2 PP.

name: Counters All Concealment (One Sense Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type that counters ALL types of concealment for that sense (e.g., 'Truesight for Visual')
description: A chosen sense type ignores all Concealment effects relevant to it. Cost 5 PP.

name: Counters Illusion (One Sense Type)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type that counters illusions for that sense
description: A chosen sense type ignores Illusion effects, automatically succeeding on resistance checks to disbelieve illusions targeting that sense. Cost 2 PP.

name: Danger Sense
parameter_prompt: Specify sense type for Danger Sense (e.g., Mental, Auditory, general intuition)
description: Gain a Perception check (DC 10, or opposed by Stealth) to avoid surprise, even if unaware of the source. Choose the sense type providing the warning. Cost 1 PP.

name: Darkvision
description: See in complete darkness (no light at all) as if it were daylight. Does not penetrate magical darkness unless specified. Cost 2 PP.

name: Direction Sense
description: Always know direction (e.g., North, up/down in zero-G). Cost 1 PP.

name: Distance Sense
description: Accurately judge distances without measurement. Cost 1 PP.

name: Extended Sense
parameter_prompt: Specify sense to extend (e.g., Hearing, Vision, Smell)
description: Increases range of a sense. Each rank extends normal range by a factor of 10 (reduces distance penalty on Perception checks by 1 per rank). Cost 1 PP per rank of Extended.

name: Infravision
description: See in darkness by detecting heat patterns. Does not work in extreme cold or against cold-bodied creatures. Cost 1 PP.

name: Low-Light Vision
description: Ignore circumstance penalties for dim light (see as if normal light). Cost 1 PP.

name: Microscopic Vision
description: See tiny objects. Each rank reduces size penalty by 1 (approx. x10 magnification). Rank 1: dust specks, Rank 2: microbes, Rank 3: DNA strands, Rank 4: cellular level details. Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Penetrates Concealment (Standard Materials)
description: Chosen sense sees through common, fairly transparent materials like cloth, wood, thin plastics (approx. Toughness 5 or less). Cost 2 PP.

name: Penetrates Concealment (Dense Materials)
description: Chosen sense sees through denser materials like stone, metal, most walls (approx. Toughness 10 or less). Cost 4 PP.

name: Penetrates Concealment (Ranked by Toughness)
parameter_prompt: Sense that penetrates (usually Vision). Each rank penetrates material of that Toughness.
description: Chosen sense sees through materials based on rank. Each rank allows penetration of material with that Toughness value. Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Postcognition
parameter_prompt: Is this Limited to Uncontrolled? (Standard is 2PP. If Flawed as Uncontrolled Remote Sensing, total cost is 4PP for the sense itself).
description: Perceive past events related to an area or object (Perception check, DC set by GM based on time elapsed/obscurity). Standard cost 2 PP. A Flawed (Uncontrolled) version like Remote Sensing can be 4 PP.

name: Precognition
parameter_prompt: Is this Limited to Uncontrolled? (Standard is 4PP. If Flawed as Uncontrolled Remote Sensing, total cost is 8PP for the sense itself).
description: Perceive future events, often vaguely or in response to specific triggers (Perception check, DC set by GM). Highly GM dependent. Standard cost 4 PP. A Flawed (Uncontrolled) version like Remote Sensing can be 8 PP.

name: Radio
description: Perceive radio frequencies as if they were normal sound. Can be Extended. Cost 1 PP.

name: Radius (Sense)
parameter_prompt: Specify sense to make Radius (e.g., Vision, Hearing, Detect X)
description: Perceive with a chosen sense in all directions around you (360 degrees). Cost 1 PP for each sense it applies to.

name: Ranged (Touch)
description: Extend tactile sense to perception range (usually matching visual range). Allows 'touching' things at a distance. Cost 1 PP.

name: Rapid Vision
description: Process visual information faster. Each rank reduces time penalty for observing fast events or large amounts of visual data by 1 (x10 speed). Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Rapid Hearing
description: Process auditory information faster. Each rank reduces time penalty by 1. Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Detect (Descriptor)
parameter_prompt: What is detected and its commonality? (e.g., 'Minds (Common, 2PP)', 'Undead (Uncommon, 1PP)', 'Specific Person (Rare, 1PP)')
description: Sense specific things as a distinct sense. Cost 2 PP for a common, broad type; 1 PP for an uncommon or rare, limited type. This sense can then be modified by Acute, Analytical, Ranged, Radius, Tracking as separate sense abilities.

name: Time Sense
description: Always know the exact time, down to the second. Cost 1 PP.

name: Tracking (Sense Mod)
parameter_prompt: Sense used for Tracking (e.g., Olfactory, Visual, Detect X)
description: Follow trails using a chosen sense. Each rank provides +1 circumstance bonus to Perception for tracking with that sense, OR negates -1 speed penalty for tracking at full speed, OR combines these. Cost 1 PP per rank.

name: Ultra-Hearing
description: Hear very high and low frequency sounds (ultrasonic, infrasonic). Cost 1 PP.

name: Ultravision
description: See into the ultraviolet spectrum. Cost 1 PP.
